Project.Brief history of your project and organi: The AI learning data created through the Korean Intelligent Information Industry Infrastructure Development Project, along with AI learning data held by domestic institutions and companies, are being made available. The AI Hub is an integrated platform for AI that supports AI infrastructure (AI data, AI software APIs, computing resources) necessary for AI technology, product, and service development, enabling anyone to use and participate. The AI Hub provides infrastructure services for development and utilization, as well as services for AI activation, for users. High-performance computing resources are provided to support large-scale data set processing for small and medium-sized enterprises, universities, and public institutions wishing to engage in AI development. This AI data is the property of the Ministry of Science and ICT of Korea, and its export from Korea is restricted.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Support is provided to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) and mid-sized companies (demand companies) that require AI solutions, helping them adopt the optimal AI solutions. At the same time, by offering new market opportunities to small and medium-sized enterprises (supply companies) that develop AI solutions, this initiative contributes to the creation and expansion of the AI industry ecosystem.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: Singularity will be used for CAR file generation, and Boost will be used for deal making.
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
